text.tspan: Long-run unemployment and real wage growth across the OECD
Unit 16 'Technological progress, employment, and living standards in the long run’ Section 16.8 'Institutions
and policies: Why do some countries do better than others?' in The CORE Team, The Economy. Available
Real wage growth (average annual growth rate, 1970-2011)
Note: Real wage growth is displayed on the 'MAP' tab. CC-BY-ND-NC
